MR No. 243 - Medical Missionary Work

     Every minister who preaches the gospel to the people should study the laws of physical health. He should carefully consider what effect eating and drinking have upon the health of the soul. By precept and example, by a life of obedience to nature's laws, he can present the truth upon this subject in a forcible manner.--Letter 73a, 1896, pp. 7, 8. (To Dr. and Mrs. Maxson, Aug. 30, 1896.)
